sentences: Iganes ta on alati täpselt aja peal.
Kas sa tuled igal või mitte?
context: The Estonian word 'iganes' is an adverb that means 'anytime', 'whenever', or 'no matter when'. It's used to express the idea of at any time, without restriction. The word can be used in different contexts such as scheduling ('come anytime'), asking about availability ('will you come?'), or describing recurring events ('every summer').
